quest.name: Monster Mash
quest.desc: Defeat overworld enemies. (Requires 3 or more guild members) You've received a guild mission from $npcName:11200005$. Form a party with 3 or more guild members and defeat overworld monsters.
quest.manual: Defeat overworld enemies alongside members of your guild
quest.complete: Speak with $npcName:11200005$ at your guild house.
